item.title: Fictional Writings
item.description: And I mean writing that doesn’t exist, not writing about things that don’t exist. So I’m working on what feels like a novel, perhaps of slightly shorter than what would be considered a big book, but not so short as to not fall into the novel category. It also seems to want to be a young adult book, through it wasn’t one when it was still rattling around in the cobwebs of my lack-of-brain.
